title: Kindly Identify the Font :)
content:
Hello Everyone,

Kindly identify the font, hope to find them quickly.

Thanks for looking and in anticipation.

Regards,  
Hasnain Munawar

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132146im_/http:/typophile.com/files/the%20Clavadel_5472.png)

Font: 

 Trajan Pro 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132146/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125

comments.content:
THE CLAVADEL/THE GEOGHEGAN GROUP: [Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132146/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/trajan)  
Part of: [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132146/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/eurostile) Extended or [Microgramma](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132146/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/microgramma)
